title: LadyAgnes：我的主修科目
author: zx728925
txt_content:
iiRedFox：Can i ask you about your major study?
iiRedFox：能不能告诉我你的主修科目？
LadyAgnes：Sure :). MSc in applied physics and electrical engineering (with a 'profile' that let me take several software classes )   :)
LadyAgnes：当然。我现在在主修应用物理学和电气工程的理学硕士（我长得也不错，所以我也上了几堂软件课）
